name: Food Hunter
body:
### Welcome to Food Hunter.
The app for free food events crowd-sourcing. Users can locate all of free food events at Cal Poly San Luis Obispo. Because "United we stand, divided we fall" - Happy hunting. You can download the apk of the beta version in here: [Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B6DNR4IjIuUgOUVfdGlRM0xuSTQ?usp=sharing)

### Authors and Contributors
The app is created by Dung "Jun" Trinh(@dungquoctrinh)

### Support or Contact
The app is still in development, future updates will help improve both functionalities and performance. We will need all help that we can get. If you are interest, fork the project or contact with the project manager at dungtrinh1993@gmail.com.

### Fun Fact
The idea for the app came out few months back. Few months ago, me and my buddy was in a chaotic process trying to land a summer internship. We went to all the networking session, trying to get an interview. Besides networking, one of the benefits from the networking session is free food. As college student, we don't have time to cook so the meals come in handy. As we were walking back to the parking lot, I came back with the idea for an app that can sum up all of the events on campus that have free food. And with that, the app is made
(We want to expand the app to other school and add new feature. If you are interest, please contact me)
